duties_responsibilities.duty: Serve as the primary point of contact for customer inquiries and provide support throughout the account life cycle.
Set up electronic files and ensure proper filing procedures, prequalify risks, generate and send out various correspondences on behalf of Underwriters.
Review, issue, and manage policies, endorsements, and cancellations/reinstatements within established underwriting guidelines and timeframes.
Respond to client communications, review and follow up on inspections, as well as handle mailings and other clerical and administrative duties as necessary.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's Degree in a business-related field (i.e., Business, Economics, Finance, Accounting, Statistics, etc.) Or Associate's degree (A.A.) or equivalent from a two-year college or technical school with 1 to 3 years preferred
